title: The Earth Through Time (Geologic Past of the Earth) 10th Levin
description:
The Earth Through Time (Geologic Past of the Earth), 10th Edition (c2013), a textbook by Harold Levin.

TEXTBOOK INFO: Google these 2 keywords together: Wiley productCd-EHEP002424

ISBN: 978-1-118-25467-7 (print) / 978-1-118-54945-2 (ebook)

AUDIENCE:  ...designed for the undergraduate student who has little previous acquaintance with geology. Students exploring the possibility of an academic major in geology, however, can be confident that the text will provide the necessary background for advanced courses. (Coverage of basic geology and paleontology, with a strong approach to stratigraphy and paleontology)
